page.title: 13Wool Church Fete
page.content: On Saturday 6th July 1985 a fete was held at the D'Urberville Centre,Wool. In the hall there were competitions. The first in these were as follows:- Jam tarts,under 10 years,Anna Hill:over 10 years,Steven Brown. Flower in a cup,Martyn Price. Marmalade,Mrs Goodman:Victoria sponge Mrs Goodman:Fruit cake,Mrs Price. There was also a cake stall,bottle stall,produce stall and raffle. Outside was a Band from Bovington, bric-a-brac and fancy goods stall. There was a fancy dress competition for children won by Melanie Morley. During the afternoon there were races for children and dads and Morris dancing by a local group.Â£550 profit was made and we all had an enjoyable time. (Anna Hill)
